duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead transformation and optimization of manufacturing operations for enhanced efficiency and agility.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to drive strategic activities and manufacturing capabilities.
Implement Lean principles and Quick Response Manufacturing to minimize setup times and improve quality.
Drive industrial and manufacturing engineering improvements to enhance safety, quality, and performance.
Drive continuous improvement initiatives and talent development to support agile manufacturing practices.
Measure, analyze, and optimize key manufacturing metrics to improve safety, quality, and delivery performance.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree (Master’s preferred) in Engineering, Manufacturing, Business Management or related field.
